trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Belton
There were no other sightings in Belton on or around June 18th 2013
Summary: It appeared unmistakenly as very bright and not a winged aircraft.
divs: Sighting DetailsI actually went out hoping to see one after the strange dreams I have been having. I just saw it, and immediately new I had never seen anything like it before. Very bright, round in shape or cigar if you will. Moved north towards Kansas City at a medium pace I guess, saw the same 30 minutes later off my deck heading in the same direction.
